title: Masteries
body:
When I try to change my masteries, in the champ select or in my summoner profil, I get this error : An unexpected error has occurred. Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server. If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information.

So I can't change my masteries, and if I try to change them, they will not load in the game, and I will have wrong masteries in game.  I already tried to reinstall the game.

replies.body:
This can easily be resolved by going to your profile, going to mastery pages, then clearing out the mastery page you land on and clearing the name and relogging. Alternatively, you can delete all your mastery pages, relog, then create them again from scratch if the first method didn't work.

Let me know if this fixed it.
